title: AI startup valuations raise bubble fears as funding surges
description: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -Artificial intelligence startups are attracting record sums of venture capital, but some of the world's largest investors warned that early-stage valuations are starting to look frothy, senior investment executives said on Friday.
content: SINGAPORE (Reuters) -Artificial intelligence startups are attracting record sums of venture capital, but some of the world's largest investors warned that early-stage valuations are starting to look frothy, senior investment executives said on Friday... [1432 chars]

title: Nvidia and Fujitsu agree to work together on AI robots and other technology
description: U.S. technology company Nvidia and Fujitsu, a Japanese telecommunications and computer maker, agreed Friday to work together on artificial intelligence to deliver smart robots and a variety of other innovations using Nvidia's computer chips.
content:
TOKYO — U.S. technology company Nvidia and Fujitsu, a Japanese telecommunications and computer maker, agreed Friday to work together on artificial intelligence to deliver smart robots and a variety of other innovations using Nvidia's computer chips.

title: LinkedIn CEO says your fancy college degree not enough, focus on this to land jobs fast
description: LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky advices young professionals that proficiency with artificial intelligence and the ability to adapt now carry more weight than a fancy degree from a top-tier academic university.
content: Gone are the days when a degree from a prestigious university promised a good career, or at least that is what LinkedIn CEO Ryan Roslansky is advising the younger generation. Roslansky warns that the global job market is shifting away from traditiona... [2528 chars]

title: Stocks Rally Further as AI Tie-Up Spree Extends: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- A tech-fueled rally in global stocks continued unabated as another round of big-ticket artificial intelligence partnerships stoked fresh optimism.
content:
(Bloomberg) — A tech-fueled rally in global stocks continued unabated as another round of big-ticket artificial intelligence partnerships stoked fresh optimism.

title: Sweden Innovation Day's 12th Edition Celebrates Its 2025 Vision of Driving Real
description: New Delhi [India], October 3: India-Sweden Innovation Day 2025 set new benchmarks in advancing collaboration across Clean Energy, Artificial Intelligence, Green Manufacturing, Circular Economy, Mobility, Smart Cities and Industry 4.0. The event strengthened the joint commitment to climate resilience and inclusive growth ahead of the COP 30 summit.

title: European Stocks Set for Best Week Since May on AI Optimism
description: European stocks were on track for their strongest week since May, gaining for a sixth day in a row amid investor optimism over artificial intelligence developments.
content:
European stocks were on track for their strongest week since May, gaining for a sixth day in a row amid investor optimism over artificial intelligence developments.
